messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: At 12:31am, Investigat0r Lewis and Chauffeur Rodney Robinson moved the decedent. Technician Muhammad photographed a spent casing, identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger. Sergeant McMullen advised Detective Morton of a blood trail. At 2:30AM, Technician Tamika Rogers conducted tests. Coroner's Office Records from Detective David Trehan classified the deaths as homicides. Detective Aucoin locked the residence after the investigation. Detective Morton reviewed the Fifth District Incident Report. Detective Ryan Aucoin directed crime scene processing. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, Detective Melvin McCullum, and Detective Pratt handled various duties at the crime scenes. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger sketched a broken doorjamb.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted by Chauffeur Rodney Robinson, moved the decedent at the crime scene.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed and identified a 'Win' 9mm Luger spent casing at the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Advised Detective Morton of a blood trail at the crime scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted gunshot residue tests at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: Coroner's Office Records from Detective Trehan classified the deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Locked the residence and placed a seal on the door after the investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Reviewed the Fifth District Incident Report and conducted on-scene investigations.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ryan AucoinOfficer Context: Directed crime scene processing.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Managed a unit during crime scene processing.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Context: Handled a scene in the 1700 block of Mazant Street.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Context: Sketched a broken doorjamb for the crime scene.Officer Role: Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer
